snoopy.blindnote: (20100701末安)snoRNABaseを参考にsequenceを5'側から1nt減らし3'側から1nt減らした,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Kiss-Laszlo, Z., Henry, Y., Bachellerie, J. P., Caizergues-Ferrer, M., and Kiss, T. (1996). Site-specific ribose methylation of preribosomal RNA: a novel function for small nucleolar RNAs. Cell, 85, 1077-1088. Tycowski, K. T., Shu, M. D., and Steitz, J. A. (1996). A mammalian gene with introns instead of exons generating stable RNA products. Nature, 379, 464-466. Tycowski, K. T., Smith, C. M., Shu, M. D., and Steitz, J. A. (1996). A small nucleolar RNA requirement for site-specific ribose methylation of rRNA in Xenopus. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A, 93, 14480-14485.
